Reports

2020-

–, 2022. Assessment of 2020 water quality in two of Moncton’s drinking water reservoirs. For the City of Moncton, New Brunswick.

–, 2020. Swan Lake water quality management. For the The City of Markham, Ontario.

–, 2020. Phosphorus mass balance for Serpentine Lake, London. For Royal Parks, London, UK.

–, 2020. Lac Maskinongé (Mont-Tremblant): The estimation of phosphorus release from bottom sediments as internal loading for 2019. Memo for Groupe Hémisphères, Quebec.

–, 2020. 2019 water quality assessment and climate impacts in two of Moncton’s drinking water reservoirs. For the City of Moncton, New Brunswick.

–. 2015. Gap analysis for nutrients in the LTVCA. The Lower Thames Valley Conservation Authority, Chatham, Ontario.
